%webosm_filters%
Crew deployed - standby for lowering winch.
Start lowering winch - hold position and stay below 150 feet above ground.
Hold position!
Get back into position!
Winch extended - standby for patient pickup. Hold position.
Patient secured - standby for winch retrieval.
Start raising winch carefully - standby for recovering patient.
Patient recovered - standby for recovering crew.
All aboard - standby for closing door.
Door closed.
Good landing. Shut down engines and standby for crew unboarding.
Crew is off - expect patient boarding in 3 minutes.
Patient on board and stable - standby for crew boarding.
Crew boarding complete. Cleared for engine startup. Outside check in progress.
Outside check complete - cleared for takeoff.
Good landing. Shut down engines and standby for crew unboarding.
Crew is off. Unloading patient.
Patient is off. Handover in progress - expect crew back in 3 minutes.
Crew boarding complete. Cleared for engine startup. Outside check in progress.
Outside check complete - cleared for takeoff.
%locations%
5 nautical miles to destination.
2 nautical miles to destination.

end_mission.success_msg: Well done pilot! See you next time!

info.title: HEMS mission for Air Glaciers EC135 out of LSGS Sion
info.short_desc:
Homebase: LSGS, Sion, pad #6 (lat: 46.22168, lon: 7.34633) Aircraft: Rotorsim EC135 V5
Please make sure your aircraft is parked and ready before starting the mission.
Each mission ends successfully with you returning safely to your homebase.
Further instructions will be provided after the mission is started.
Good luck!
